column4: and no amount of changing colour settings in 'login screens' gets rid of it.

I just got one
sudo gedit /etc/gdm/PreSession/Default
oh sorry, i missed that.
wwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah thank you thank you!!! no more ugly colours!
